synos.tran: 发光体；杰出人物；知识渊博的人

remMethod.val: lumin (光) + ary (物) → 发光的物体 → 发光体

words.tran: [光][电子] 亮度；[光] 发光性（等于luminosity）；光明

trans.tranCn: 发光体；杰出人物；知识渊博的人
trans.tranOther: someone who is very famous or highly respected for their skill at doing something or their knowledge of a particular subject
